Source citation mismatch: index says 'פנים יפות (פרשת בא)' but book text abbreviation is 'פרד״י בא' which likely stands for a different source (possibly פרדס יוסף or similar). The expansion of the abbreviation may be incorrect.

Reason elaborates beyond source text: the index adds 'כיון שאין זה מעשה מצוה חיובית אלא הימנעות מעבירה, שכרו אינו עיקר שכר מצוה' as the mechanism, but the source text simply states the ruling without explaining this reasoning. The explanation is a logical inference but not found in the original.

Reason adds 'מידה כנגד מידה' as a mechanism which is not stated in the brief source text. The source simply says when one does beautiful service, God adds to his reward in this world.

Reason adds 'שהרי הוא מקדש את החומר ומעלהו לרוחניות' which is an interpretive addition. The source simply says connecting this-world matters with next-world matters (e.g., giving tzedaka with his wealth) earns abundant this-world blessing.
Reason adds 'כדי שיוכל להמשיך לכבד את התורה' which is not in the source text. The source simply states that one who uses this-world enjoyments for Torah honor receives wealth and honor from God.
